featured.text: The innovative footwear resembles a common sandal and is made of leather straps and rubber soles, a material similar to that used in tires.

definition.zh_def: 太陽，特別是指地球的中心天體。
definition.en_def: The star at the center of the solar system that provides light and heat to the Earth.
definition.example: The sol rises in the east and sets in the west.
